SEARCH
Package interfaces

Interface AdminMenu

All Superinterfaces:
CommonMenu
All Known Implementing Classes:
AdminUI
public interface AdminMenu extends CommonMenu
The interface extends
invalid reference 
CommonMenus
to provide additional administrative functionalities. It defines methods specific for Administators like managing various aspects of the system, such as hospital staff, appointments, inventory, and replenish requests.

The methods in this interface are intended to be implemented by classes that provide the actual functionality for an administrator to manage the different system components.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    manageAppointments(Scanner sc)
    Manages appointments, allowing the administrator to view and modify appointment details.
    void
    manageHospitalStaff(Scanner sc, Role role)
    Manages hospital staff based on their role
    void
    manageInventory(Scanner sc)
    Manages the medication inventory, enabling the administrator to view and update stock levels.
    void
    manageReplenishRequest(Scanner sc)
    Manages replenish requests for inventory, including approval or rejection of requests.

    Methods inherited from interface interfaces.CommonMenu

    displayMenu, logout

  • Method Details

    • manageHospitalStaff

      void manageHospitalStaff(Scanner sc, Role role)
      Manages hospital staff based on their role
      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object for user input.
      role - The Role of the staff to manage (Doctor, Pharmacist, Administator).
